title: List reservation groups
description: Lists all BigQuery reservation groups within a specified project and location.

objective.narrative: This sample solves the problem of needing to programmatically inventory all existing BigQuery reservation groups. A developer might use this to build a dashboard showing reservation usage or to automate the process of assigning projects to reservations by first getting a list of available groups.

regionTags.name: bigqueryreservation_v1_reservationservice_reservationgroups_list
regionTags.title: List reservation groups
regionTags.description: Lists all BigQuery reservation groups within a specified project and location.
